keyInfo.title: Meeting Agenda Outline
keyInfo.text:
Please see the agenda outline linked here:  [GWC25 Madrid - Jan 2026 FINAL Site Visit Agenda.xlsx](https://gartner365.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/sites/GWC-External/GWC25Partner/GWC25%20MADRID/GWC25%20-%20Site%20Visits/January%202026%20-%20FINAL/GWC25%20Madrid%20-%20Jan%202026%20FINAL%20Site%20Visit%20Agenda.xlsx?d=w3cca19e86fb6408f8367344a69d83f00&csf=1&web=1&e=sgcW6b)

Please ensure you are arranging your vendor meetings in accordance with the overall programme timings we have planned, and capture these in the agenda document.

keyInfo.title: Travel
keyInfo.text:
Your travel should be confirmed either directly or via ADTRAV. Please ensure you double check your itinerary via the Airlines website, to ensure dates & times are as expected.

\*\*Arrivals At MAD Airport/Baggage Claim:  
\*\*Madrid is a large airport! After you disembark, please follow the signs to Baggage Claim, which may require you take an automated tram (flight/gate dependant). After baggage claim at Madrid Airport, you'll head towards Customs, then exit into the Arrivals Hall.  

If you have been booked a private transfer, Zoe will put this in your diary with any required contact information or instructions. Otherwise, we request you to take a taxi, so please follow signs for Taxis, Ride-Shares and Metro, with clear directions to transport options.

keyInfo.title: Hotel
keyInfo.text:
We will be split across two hotel properties in Madrid. You can find your allocation  [HERE](https://gartner365.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/sites/GWC-External/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7B3CCA19E8-6FB6-408F-8367-344A69D83F00%7D&file=GWC25%20Madrid%20-%20Jan%202026%20FINAL%20Site%20Visit%20Agenda.xlsx&action=default&mobileredirect=true).

1 -RIU Plaza Madrid, Gran Via 84, Centro, 28013, Madrid, Spain

2 -The Palace, A Luxury Collection Hotel.Pl. de las Cortes 7, Centro, 28014, Madrid, Spain

keyInfo.title: Check-in procedure
keyInfo.text:
Standard check in time at each hotel is 15:00. For any early long-haul arrivals, we have already requested early check-in where possible.

Hotel room accommodation & taxes have been paid for by Gartner, you will be required to leave a credit card for all incidental charges upon check in.

Arrivals to RIU after midday, please utilise the groups check-in entrance.

keyInfo.title: Check-out Procedure
keyInfo.text:
You will be required to check out from your hotel room by 12:00 on your day of departure. Please ensure those at the Palace check out prior to heading to RIU on the final day of the site visit.

Those on a departing flight after 10pm, we have guaranteed your room for the following night.

Fitness centre Palace: The fitness centre is located on the top floor of the hotel and is operational 24 hours daily.

Fitness centre & pool RIU: The fitness centre and pool are located on the 21st floor of the hotel and are operational 24 hours daily.

Breakfast RIU:  A group of tables will be held each morning Monday through Wednesday at Cervantes restaurant. Berni will communicate this in the group WhatsApp.

Please note queues can form in the breakfast restaurant during the morning and we would recommend allowing an extra 30 minutes ahead of transfers/ the meeting start time. Breakfast is included in your room rate.

Breakfast Palace:  Breakfast is available Monday through Wednesday in La Capula restaurant. James will communicate if any table reservation is held for this in the group WhatsApp.

Please note queues can form in the breakfast restaurant during the morning and we would recommend allowing an extra 30 minutes ahead of transfers/ the meeting start time. Breakfast is included in your room rate.

keyInfo.title: Useful Info:
keyInfo.text: Climate: At this time of year, the temperatures range from chilly 3-13 degrees Celsius / 38-55 degrees Fahrenheit, we recommend you bear this in mind when packing for your trip.

keyInfo.title: Meals
keyInfo.text:
Gartner will arrange lunches for you daily – further details are available in the agenda, and more information will be provided onsite.

Dinners have been arranged as follows:

Sunday 25th January @ 7:30pm – [Caluana](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Hotel+Riu+Plaza+Espa%C3%B1a,+Gran+V%C3%ADa,+Madrid,+Spain/Calle+de+la+Bolsa,+12,+Centro,+28012+Madrid,+Spain/@40.4186622,-3.7191546,15z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0xd422864d7bef745:0x5fa651364a205e7c!2m2!1d-3.7111637!2d40.4240286!1m5!1m1!1s0xd4229fb325d0a0d:0x67974a3570a622c4!2m2!1d-3.705021!2d40.4151056!3e0?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI2MDExMy4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2OUgBUAM%3D) Restaurant (offsite)

Monday 26th January @ 7pm – Various Dine Arounds (see your outlook invite)

Tuesday 27th January @ 6:30pm  - Drinks followed by Dinner @ [Ten Con Ten](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Hotel+Riu+Plaza+Espa%C3%B1a,+Gran+V%C3%ADa,+Madrid,+Spain/Cl.+de+Ayala,+6,+Salamanca,+28001+Madrid,+Spain/@40.4295583,-3.7054711,16z/data=!3m2!4b1!5s0xd422891446ef1ab:0x568b35b9ea3f19f0!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0xd422864d7bef745:0x5fa651364a205e7c!2m2!1d-3.7111637!2d40.4240286!1m5!1m1!1s0xd42289144e3a021:0x4cb005dae2581c14!2m2!1d-3.6885071!2d40.4278858!3e0?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI2MDExMy4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2OUgBUAM%3D)

Please do let us know if you have any dietary or medical requirements, by tracking  [here](https://gartner365.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/sites/GWC-External/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7B3CCA19E8-6FB6-408F-8367-344A69D83F00%7D&file=GWC25%20Madrid%20-%20Jan%202026%20FINAL%20Site%20Visit%20Agenda.xlsx&action=default&mobileredirect=true) on the Team Dinners Tab

keyInfo.title: Dress Code
keyInfo.text:
Meeting & Evenings: Business casual (when indoors, temperature can fluctuate so we would recommend wearing layers).

Complejo/Walking: We will be spending time outside in the gardens at Complejo, so please plan accordingly and wear comfortable shoes.

keyInfo.title: WhatsApp Group:
keyInfo.text:
Please join our site visit WhatsApp group in advance of travelling, this group will be our main source of communication during the site visit.

[https://chat.whatsapp.com/ERq6fcsAdfeHaEg5c21atm](https://chat.whatsapp.com/ERq6fcsAdfeHaEg5c21atm)
